expressDelivery.title: Super Fast Delivery - On Time Every Hour
expressDelivery.description: Express delivery is a shipping service in which parcels or goods are transported from the sender to the recipient faster than standard delivery services. This service is typically used for goods that need urgent delivery or have high value, and often includes features such as shipment tracking, cargo insurance, and same-day or next-day delivery.

feature1.title: Fast Delivery Speed
feature1.description: Goods are transported and delivered in a shorter time than standard delivery services, helping you save time and meet urgent needs.

feature2.title: Guaranteed Safety
feature2.description: Packages are usually handled more carefully and can be insured, helping protect high-value or fragile goods.

feature3.title: Real-time Tracking
feature3.description: Express delivery service provides real-time shipment tracking, allowing you to easily check the location and status of your package at any time.

feature4.title: Same-day Or Next-day Delivery
feature4.description: Most express delivery services commit to same-day or next-day delivery, helping you meet urgent requirements in a timely manner.

feature5.title: High Flexibility
feature5.description: Express delivery service usually provides flexible options for delivery time and additional services, such as weekend or after-hours delivery.

feature6.title: 24/7 Support
feature6.description: Customer service team is always ready to assist you anytime, anywhere.

step1.title: Place Order
step1.description: Create order via App, Website or call hotline 1900 6463

step2.title: Pick Up
step2.description: Shipper picks up goods within 30-60 minutes in the city

step3.title: Transport
step3.description: Goods are transported through optimized hub system

pricing.title: Estimated Delivery Time
pricing.description: Delivery time depends on distance and actual shipping conditions.

cta.title: Ship Today
cta.description: Contact us now for consultation and detailed quotation

feature1.title: Intracity 2-4 hours
feature1.description: Super-fast delivery within Hanoi, HCMC and major cities in just 2-4 hours from pickup.

feature2.title: Intercity within 24 hours
feature2.description: Guaranteed intercity delivery within 24 hours for Hanoi-HCMC and main routes.

feature3.title: Fast COD collection
feature3.description: Support cash on delivery (COD) and bank transfer within 24-48 hours after successful delivery.

feature4.title: Real-time tracking
feature4.description: Real-time order status updates via SMS, App and Website.

feature5.title: 100% value insurance
feature5.description: 100% compensation for goods value in case of incidents during transportation.

feature6.title: Free 3 re-deliveries
feature6.description: Support up to 3 free re-deliveries if recipient is not available.

step1.title: Place Order
step1.description: Create order via App, Website or call 1900 6463

step2.title: Pickup
step2.description: Courier picks up within 30-60 minutes intracity

step3.title: Transport
step3.description: Goods transported through optimized hub system

step4.title: Delivery
step4.description: Hand-deliver to recipient, confirm via OTP

pricing.title: Reference Pricing
pricing.description: Shipping rates based on weight and distance. Contact us for detailed quotation.

cta.title: Ship today
cta.description: Register business account to receive up to 30% discount

economyDelivery.title: Cost-effective - Still Quality Assured
economyDelivery.description: Cost-optimized shipping solution for non-urgent orders. Suitable for bulk goods, oversized items, and scheduled deliveries.

feature1.title: Save up to 30% on costs
feature1.description: 20-30% lower rates than express delivery, suitable for bulk orders.

feature2.title: Flexible scheduled delivery
feature2.description: Choose delivery date as desired, matching recipient's schedule.

feature3.title: Oversized items support
feature3.description: Handle oversized, heavy items up to 50kg/parcel at preferential rates.

feature4.title: Multi-point consolidation
feature4.description: Support pickup from multiple locations, saving time and costs.

feature5.title: Careful packaging
feature5.description: Standard packaging, maximum protection during transportation.

feature6.title: Regular reports
feature6.description: Provide detailed delivery status reports for businesses.

pricing.title: Preferential Pricing
pricing.description: Most competitive market rates, volume discounts available.

cta.title: Start saving now
cta.description: Register now for special offers for new customers

standardDelivery.title: Balance Between Speed and Cost
standardDelivery.description: Standard delivery is a shipping service for goods or documents with average delivery time. This service is commonly used for items that don't need immediate delivery but still want to ensure goods arrive on time and safely.

feature1.title: Balance Between Speed and Cost
feature1.description: More affordable than express delivery but faster than economy, suitable for most needs.

feature2.title: High Reliability
feature2.description: Specific delivery timeframe with high reliability, ensuring goods arrive on schedule.

feature3.title: Suitable for Regular Goods
feature3.description: Ideal choice for non-perishable items that don't need immediate delivery.

feature4.title: Easy Tracking
feature4.description: Provides shipment tracking option, check order status anytime.

feature5.title: Wide Delivery Coverage
feature5.description: Covers more areas, especially remote or hard-to-reach regions.

feature6.title: Safety Guarantee
feature6.description: Goods handled carefully and can be fully insured for their value.

pricing.title: Estimated Delivery Time
pricing.description: Delivery time depends on distance and actual shipping conditions.

cta.title: Ship Today
cta.description: Contact us now for consultation and detailed quotation

samedayDelivery.title: Super Fast Delivery - Within the Same Day
samedayDelivery.description: Same-day delivery is a shipping service for goods or documents with commitment to deliver within the same day. This service is designed for items needing immediate delivery, such as important documents, urgent goods, or orders requiring fast processing.

feature1.title: Immediate Delivery
feature1.description: Ideal choice for urgent situations, important documents requiring immediate delivery.

feature2.title: Maximum Time Savings
feature2.description: Helps save significant time, quickly meeting urgent needs.

feature3.title: High Reliability
feature3.description: Guarantees on-time delivery within the same day, reducing risks and increasing reliability.

feature4.title: Real-time Tracking
feature4.description: Track orders online, easily check goods status and location.

feature5.title: Emergency Support
feature5.description: Excellent choice for medical, financial, and legal sectors.

feature6.title: Safe Transportation
feature6.description: Goods guaranteed safe to recipient with professional processes.

step1.title: Order Before 9:30 AM
step1.description: Create order via App, Website or call hotline 1900 6463

step3.title: Priority Transport
step3.description: Goods prioritized for direct transport to destination

pricing.title: Delivery Time Slots
pricing.description: Order before 9:30 AM to receive goods same day from 3PM-12AM.
